name: Demiurges
description:
Choose your side

play as 

enclave: a faction of enginers and wisdom seekers with their machines and experiments 

or 

reef: a faction of reptiles ruled by intelligent corals

Cards

build a deck to suit your strategy. Add more card buildings when you want to focus on the economy or add more spells and summons to surprise your enemy with rush 

Map

explore a map full of items, encounters, structures, and resources. Defeat guardians to unlock new segments of the map.

Demiurges

get experience to unlock powerful skills and let your demiurge grow. Collect items and army to be stronger 

Town

use cards to develop your city. Additional structures allow you to hire new creatures, get additional income, and much more.

Hiring

hire new army members to help your demiurges with map exploration. Every building has two levels with upgraded unit versions. 

Battle

fight with your enemies with your army. Use powerful spells to change the battlefield, deal damage, or buff units. Use unique creatures skills to use their potential fully

Golden Grail

be first on the middle section of the map and get the golden grail. The first player wins.

Prototype limitations

For now, the game has some limitations because of the early development stage. I hope to eliminate it in the next couple of months. Some of them:

- immutable deck

- only two factions

- only one map

- a small number of buildings in towns

- only 3 demiurges

- lack of content on the map

- only hot-seat mode

- lack of balance
